name: wifizone
description: Plateforme de vente de tickets WiFi avec paiements mobile money

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.replit:setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db && npm run start:services
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start:postgres" "npm run start:redis" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"

author: WiFiZone Team
